desc: I need someone (ideally 2 or 3 individuals) to help me call a list of up to 500 medical/health industry individuals based in Korea. The calls will be reminder calls asking if those previously sent email invitations have received them, and to urge them them to register for our half-day Heart Health conference taking place in Seoul next month, September 21st (no fee required to attend).The calling list will be shared via Google Sheets, along with general phone numbers for the individual's companies, hospitals, etc. Instructions for the calling steps will be provided. Calls will be expected to be short, a simple reminder or inquiry about the email invitation. Original email invitation will be provided for reference. Registrations should be done via the registration form link included in the original invitation.Some of the materials provided (and the direction from me) will be in English, so I will need the individual to have good communication skills in English (Native or near Native), and Native in Korean (as all outbound communication will be in Korean).We are aiming to obtain 50-60 registrations from these calls, and a commission will be provided per registration acquired (to be further discussed). Average calls expected to be placed (given our past experience) is 8-12 per hour, depending on duration of call.We have other projects of a similar nature that can be secured if the candidate is successful with registration results.
title: korean telemarketing

desc: Looking for a dynamic, self driven, highly motivated Sales and Marketing Manager who is able to help a start-up get off the ground. We're a technology based logistics company looking for an individual who can collaborate with the current team to understand the business plan, formalize and improve it (if needed), and then approach potential consumers. This job will provide you an insight of a great start-up in the making, and will give you an opportunity to be a part of it.Desired qualifications:-Ready to work with flexible hours using his/her own resources without a designated office space.-Has excellent business network around the area.-Has excellent communication, written, and verbal skills.-Ability to work with minimum supervision; self starter individual with a problem solving attitude.-Should be able to venture into different roles based on need or reach out to right people on business's need basis.-Knowledge of logistics is a plus.- Okay to work sideways with your existing job if any as this is commission based role.If you feel that you could be fit for this job, please apply. We look forward to hearing from you.Job Type: Commission
title: Hire a Marketing Specialist
